title: Clauses Grammar Guide
description: Comprehensive guide covering clauses used in professional contexts with examples from various industries

basic_concepts.definition: Clauses are groups of words that contain a subject and a verb, forming a complete thought or part of a sentence that provides additional information and context.
key_functions: Provide additional information about nouns or pronouns
Show relationships between ideas and concepts
Add context and detail to main statements

examples.example: who specialize in creating seamless interactions
examples.description: Provides additional information about a person or thing

examples.example: when it revolves around user needs
examples.description: Adds context about when, where, or how something happens

user_experience.title: User Experience (UX) Vocabulary
